summary: Implementation partially addresses category-based pricing requirements. REQ-1 and REQ-2 are implemented through both a migration script and a backend method that updates prices to $9 for 3D printed items and $19 for ceramic items. REQ-3 is only partially implemented: a frontend UI (CategoryPriceEditor) exists but only applies hardcoded prices, not dynamic category selection and price specification as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin interface that allows bulk price updates by category with category selection and custom price specification
missing_requirements.reason: The CategoryPriceEditor component only applies hardcoded prices ($9 for 3D printed, $19 for ceramic) via a single button. It does not allow admins to select a category from a dropdown and specify a custom price as required by the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: UI shows confirmation of how many items were updated
missing_requirements.reason: The CategoryPriceEditor shows a generic success toast but does not display the count of items that were updated per category.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module that automatically updates existing item prices based on category
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration system or automatically updating existing items at startup. It only requests backend logic to update prices and an admin interface for manual updates.
